statements: SELECT * FROM neural_network_experiments WHERE experiment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT hyperparameters FROM neural_network_experiments WHERE experiment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT training_config FROM neural_network_experiments WHERE experiment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT experiment_id, hyperparameters FROM neural_network_experiments WHERE experiment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM neural_network_experiments WHERE experiment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND hyperparameters ->> 'learning_rate' = '0.001';
SELECT * FROM neural_network_experiments ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, hyperparameters->'learning_rate', training_config->'batch_size' FROM neural_network_experiments WHERE training_config->>'optimizer' = 'Adam' ORDER BY experiment_id ASC;
SELECT experiment_id, hyperparameters, training_config FROM neural_network_experiments WHERE hyperparameters->>'activation' = 'ReLU' LIMIT 3;
SELECT experiment_id, hyperparameters, training_config FROM neural_network_experiments WHERE hyperparameters->>'layers' LIKE '%conv%' AND training_config->>'optimizer' = 'SGD';
SELECT experiment_id, hyperparameters, training_config FROM neural_network_experiments WHERE training_config->'loss_function'->>'name' = 'CrossEntropyLoss';
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters;
SELECT hyperparameter_name, hyperparameter_value FROM hyperparameters WHERE hyperparameter_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters ORDER BY hyperparameter_name DESC;
SELECT hyperparameter_name, hyperparameter_id FROM hyperparameters ORDER BY hyperparameter_id, hyperparameter_name;
SELECT hyperparameter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_configs FROM training_configs GROUP BY hyperparameter_id;
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters
SELECT hyperparameter_name, hyperparameter_value FROM hyperparameters WHERE hyperparameter_id = 1
SELECT hyperparameter_name, hyperparameter_value FROM hyperparameters ORDER BY hyperparameter_name DESC

SELECT training_configs.config_id, hyperparameters.hyperparameter_name, training_configs.learning_rate FROM training_configs LEFT JOIN hyperparameters ON training_configs.hyperparameter_id = hyperparameters.hyperparameter_id
SELECT hyperparameter_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM hyperparameters GROUP BY hyperparameter_name HAVING count >= 2
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters;
SELECT experiment_id, learning_rate FROM hyperparameters ORDER BY learning_rate DESC;
SELECT model_type, optimizer FROM configuration WHERE model_type = 'Neural Network';
SELECT experiment_id, accuracy, precision, recall FROM metrics WHERE accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT experiment_id, learning_rate, batch_size, epochs FROM hyperparameters WHERE epochs = 10;
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters;
SELECT experiment_id, learning_rate FROM hyperparameters WHERE batch_size > 32 ORDER BY learning_rate DESC;

SELECT m.metric_id, m.experiment_id, h.learning_rate, h.epochs, c.model_type FROM metrics m JOIN hyperparameters h ON m.experiment_id = h.experiment_id JOIN configuration c ON h.experiment_id = c.experiment_id WHERE m.accuracy > 0.85 ORDER BY h.epochs ASC, m.accuracy DESC;

SELECT h.experiment_id, h.batch_size, c.optimizer, m.recall FROM hyperparameters h LEFT JOIN configuration c ON h.experiment_id = c.experiment_id RIGHT JOIN metrics m ON h.experiment_id = m.experiment_id WHERE h.learning_rate < 0.001 AND c.model_type = 'CNN';

SELECT h.experiment_id, c.config_id, m.metric_id, h.learning_rate, c.optimizer, m.accuracy FROM hyperparameters h, configuration c, metrics m WHERE h.experiment_id = c.experiment_id AND h.experiment_id = m.experiment_id AND h.epochs >= 100 ORDER BY m.accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters;
SELECT exp_name, start_time, end_time FROM experiments;
SELECT config_name, epoch_count, learning_rate FROM training_configurations WHERE learning_rate > 0.01;
SELECT model_id, validation_accuracy FROM model_performance ORDER BY validation_accuracy DESC;
SELECT hparam_name, hparam_type, hparam_value FROM hyperparameters WHERE hparam_type = 'regularization';
SELECT * FROM hyperparameters;
SELECT hparam_name, hparam_value FROM hyperparameters ORDER BY hparam_name DESC;
SELECT exp_name, start_time, end_time FROM experiments WHERE start_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_id, validation_accuracy FROM model_performance WHERE validation_accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT config_name, learning_rate FROM training_configurations JOIN hyperparameters ON training_configurations.hparams_id = hyperparameters.hyperparam_id WHERE hparam_type = 'optimizer';
SELECT * FROM Hyperparameter;
SELECT hyperparameter_name, hyperparameter_value FROM Hyperparameter WHERE hyperparameter_value > 0.5;
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM Model ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, model_id, hyperparameter_id FROM Experiment WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Evaluation WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY evaluation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hyperparameter WHERE hyperparameter_value > 0.5;
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM Model WHERE model_type = 'CNN';
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, model_name FROM Experiment JOIN Model ON Experiment.model_id = Model.model_id;
SELECT model_name, COUNT(*) AS num_experiments FROM Model JOIN Experiment ON Model.model_id = Experiment.model_id GROUP BY model_name;

SELECT model_name, AVG(accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM Model JOIN Experiment ON Model.model_id = Experiment.model_id JOIN Evaluation ON Experiment.experiment_id = Evaluation.experiment_id GROUP BY model_name;
